name: 32f8080a-8e01-5b59-959a-b15a8500bd78
notes: This service provides filter absorption photometer measurements of volume absorption coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles observed at Jungfraujoch, Switzerland (20030101 - 20150101). The observations contain level 2 data. The time resolution is 1h. The observations are stored in the EBAS database (http://ebas.nilu.no/).
title: Measurements of volume absorption coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles at Jungfraujoch, Switzerland (20030101 - 20150101)
